title: All the Way
description: The light at the end of nice boy Ian s boring summer is Danielle, someone he met online who might be really hot and who might have agreed to have sex with him. Ian is new to this sex thing and Danielle is nine hundred miles away, but Ian thinks Danielle mightbe the right girl, and if he can get himself and his two best friends, Lance and Felicia, into his aged Oldsmobile and en route to Danielle in their last weekend before senior year starts, he just mightbe about to have sex! The road trip, then, becomes The Sex Drive, wherein Ian might motor his way to love, if he can figure out how nice boys finish first.Author Biography: Andy Behrens is a freelance writer living in Chicago. He has written for the Chicago Reader, Flak Magazine, and ESPN.com, as well as other publications.This is his first novel.
author: Andy Behrens
